prompts: Create a fossil-type Pokemon that resembles a prehistoric creature with scythe-like arms.
Imagine a water-dwelling Pokemon that has a sleek, streamlined body and sharp claws.
Design a Pokemon with a unique combination of stone and shell features, perfect for rocky terrains.
Show me a creature that blends ancient marine life with modern Pokemon traits, emphasizing agility.
Make a Pokemon that has a menacing look with sharp edges and a pale color scheme.
Generate a fierce predator Pokemon that thrives in cave-like habitats, showcasing its hunting skills.
Give me a Pokemon that has a distinctive exoskeleton and agile limbs, ideal for fast-paced battles.
